This app helps you with the money problem whenever you buy something with a bunch of people or your friends, usually some pay while some does not, then there is a big mathematics problem you have to crack to know "WHO OWES WHOM" and "HOW MUCH?"
 Let us understand this by an example: 
 Rahul, Rohan, Anuj and Sudhanshu bought a gift for his friend worth Rs. 200 
 Rahul gave Rs.100 
 Rohan gave Rs.100 
 while Anuj and Sudhanshu were out of cash. 
 So, this app will tell you:
 Anuj will give 50 to Rahul
 Sudhanshu will give 50 to Rohan 
 This is just a basic problem, you can solve any complex problem with SplitUp

 TUTORIAL
 1. Start by entering name and amount they contributed.
 2. To enter details of next person, press NEXT
 TIP: Leave amount field blank to set it to ZERO.
 3. If anything goes wrong, press ERASE ALL and then enter all entries again, so be careful while entering the details.
 4. When you are finished press DONE and see the results.
Leave amount field blank to set it to zero
